resources.string:
App Name: ES Words

Developer: Isuru Hettiarachchi

This app contains a collection of 5000 English words, each with its Spanish translation and a simple English definition. It is designed to help users improve their vocabulary and language skills in an easy and interactive way.

Features:
- Beginner and advanced word levels
- Clear definitions and translations
- Interactive and user-friendly design

For more information, contact: isurusula@gmail.com
